headline: Human Resources  at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary: Dedicated United States Marine Corps Veteran with active DOD Secret Security Clearance.  Served as a Production and Quality Assurance Supervisor in the field of Avionics Electrician. Seeking a position in which my 5 years of Leadership experience and skills can improve the companyâs productivity, profitability and allow me the opportunity for personal growth.

positions.description:
â¢	Production Supervisor in charge of intermediate maintenance shop tasked with repairing electrical components on rotary/fixed wing military aircraft, consisting of 60 employees, 5 leads, and another 15 relocated worldwide.

â¢	Determined whether components were operable or inoperable and were within the quality guidelines of the department.
â¢	Maintained a low count work load on a military information system.
â¢	Screened and authorized part orders to repair components.
â¢	Utilized various resources to track part order shipments and expedite parts based on the priority of component.
â¢	Repurposed parts from similar components to get critical life-saving components back on aircraft as quickly as possible, with an average turnaround time of 24 hours.
â¢	Attended daily meetings and kept employees informed throughout the work day.
â¢	Tracked employee attendance every morning and submitted report to higher authorities.
â¢	Ensured employees were using proper personal protective equipment and maintenance manuals to reduce risk.
â¢	Confirmed employees conformed to all Standard Operating Procedures.
â¢	Utilized Operational Risk Management to minimize the number of mishaps.
positions.title: Production/ Quality Assurance Supervisor
